channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2023090084
item.description:
Report X-2023090084

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO RESPOND TO LEAKING PACKAGE ON THE UNLOAD. RESPONDER USED SPILL CART AND WENT TO UNLOAD DISCOVERED LEAKING HAZMAT. RESPONDER PLACED LEAKING PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY THEN BROUGHT BACK TO DMP TO PROCESS LEAKER.

item.title: Report X-2023081809
item.description:
Report X-2023081809

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-23
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This package was put on the IC rollers by a package handler. The drum fell of as it was going down the rollers causing it to break open on the bottom. DescribePack: Broke on the bottom of metal drum. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: spill pads and spill tote.

item.title: Report X-2023081532
item.description:
Report X-2023081532

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package handler noticed wet hazmat package. Notified Manager, Manager secured box in tote and handed to QA. DescribePack: Loose cap contents leaked out DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA wearing gloves secured hazmat tote lined with plastic liner. Evaluated the leaking package discovered loose caps. Re-tightened caps to prevent further leakage.

item.title: Report X-2023081515
item.description:
Report X-2023081515

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-10
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pack Handler noted leakage from package. Manager was alerted who then handed it to QA. DescribePack: Plastic Jug cracked on seam under handle and leaked contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Box was secured in hazmat tote. Plastic jug was place in plastic bag.
